website_summaries.verdict: These LED lights can rotate more than 190° to light up whatever's cooking.
pros: 10 bright LED lights rotate 190° to light your grill
Made of durable, heat-resistant ABS plastic
Fits most grill handles except kettle grills
cons: Plastic may melt if installed too close to heat source

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it came with the grill
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really good decision! It really does the job, lighting up the grill brightly and evenly. I've had it for about 3 months, and I'm totally satisfied. The light mounted very easily and quickly and adjusts just as easily, if needed, which is pretty much never. It turns on and off with a touch, but has never turned on or off when it wasn't supposed to. I don't know how it would stand up to direct weather, because I cover my grill, but winter and spring cold and rains and such haven't caused any problems. From my experience to this point, I would certainly recommend the Grill Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a flash light!
customer_reviews.text: How can you make a grill light that fastens to the handle and then needs to be taken off after each use. It is NOT WEATHER PROOF< how dumb is that. The product looks great until you read the instructions. A lot easier and cheaper to use a flash light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT/PROOF!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and not at all waterproof. They don't even make an attempt to keep the water out by using a seal or and silicone around the housing. Quit working mid season so I only took it out when using it which kind of defeats the purpose of an attached grill light. Recently, it started short out. The water had gotten inside and corroded the the connections. I tried to fix it but the little cheap wires inside broke. Don't get this one or ones like it if you want one that will last. This is direct to landfill unfortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lyngholm

customer_reviews.title: Take that Darkness!
customer_reviews.text: This weatherproof LED light is super easy to install and works like a charm. Our grill is in a very dark corner and this little light of mine shines like you wouldn't believe. It lights up the entire grill surface area (we have a 5 burner grill) plus the area right around the grill. Works off of batteries and just tightens right to the handle. Durable construction and easy on/off button makes for a perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: BPotts

customer_reviews.title: lIGHT TURNS ON AND DRAINS BATTERIES
customer_reviews.text: love the light. Hate the light switch. It turns on by just touching it. That means that it turns on when you put the cover on your grill or when the wind blows your cover against it and drains the batteries. Tired of the batteries always being drained when I go to use it. Have to use it as a shop light or something. I was just going to reverse a battery so it wouldn't turn on but you need a screw driver to get into the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 months and threads stripped
customer_reviews.text: update Jan 2017 After 4 months of use, the clamp of the light stripped. I hadn't noticed that the mounting just had plastic threads. With my normal use, the threads gradually wore out until the mount no longer worked. Bad design! Should have metal threads. original post: The grill light fits perfectly on my Weber grill. The light is certainly bright enough, even barbecuing in the rain. The quality of constructions seems good. Shipped via amazon Prime and arrived quickly and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Smalks

customer_reviews.title: Fits Chargriller Akorn Kamado perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: After several years of grilling in the dark with my phones flashlight, I have finally found a solution. The size of this light is very compact and easily folds out of the way to fit any size grill cover. I used this on my Chargriller akorn kamado and it fits perfectly. I love how the button to activate the light is touch sensitive. I thought this would be an issue with it being activated unintentionally but no issues so far. Highly recommend this product for all of you late night grillers!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Better than the previous light.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality then my last light. The instructions aren’t very good though like where the in off button is located which turned out to be tapping the device on the top. The clamp is also designed for a round or cylindrical handle but I made it work. Overall though I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tilt well, hits grill when closed, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It took ten minutes to see this light was unusable. On my Weber Genesis grill, if I position it to light the grilling surface, it hits the grill when I close the lid. If I move the light so it doesn’t hit the grill, it can only shine light into the air. The light can tilt & swivel, just not far enough or in the right directions. Plus you should remove it after every use due to weather? Sent it back 10 minutes after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Bing

customer_reviews.title: Product broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product has received so many good reviews. Maybe folks haven’t updated them after having this light for some time. I purchased this light a few months ago, and it was okay while it lasted. However, the product is very cheap and the screws nearby the pivot point came out. Due to the design, it’s impossible to get it back in. I reached out to the company to see if I could get a replacement, but they refuse to stand behind their product. Overall, I can not recommend this product if you’re looking for a light that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of worthless junk
customer_reviews.text: This barbecue grill light is a total piece of junk. The first second I put batteries in it would not light. About five minutes after installing the batteries and pushing the on button with no response the light would suddenly turn itself on. The on off switch does absolutely nothing and this light is a total piece of junk. Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: Beth G

customer_reviews.title: Very bright very sturdy definitely weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband's grill for Christmas. It's an awesome product. Very bright it's already snowed on it twice and it works perfect. you can adjust the light to wherever you want it and it stays put. The brightness is all you need to check your food on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: cammya717

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far. It fits on the handle of my Weber grill OK (about what to expect with an aftermarket grill light). It sticks out some so when I cover the grill I need to be careful not to jar the light from the handle. I really liked Weber's OEM add-on light for my model, it was sleek, but it broke and Weber doesn't make them anymore. This aftermarket one offers plenty of light when operating...it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: And

customer_reviews.title: Reliability in a BBQ Light
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a reliable, bright barbeque light for a few weeks. I have ordered and purchased, and reviewed several lights. Far above the rest is the Grill Kindle. I purchased one for us and one for our neighbor. We LOVE the Grill Kindle. It is reliable, the batteries don't fall out, as they do in other lights, and the light is bright enough to cook at midnight in the dark! Please continue to offer barbeque items, lights, etc. We always purchase double and share with our neighbors. Thank you for the light. It is the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: ... it is hard to grill out when lighting is bad on deck at night
customer_reviews.text: I work mid shift so it is hard to grill out when lighting is bad on deck at night. This is perfect light. I love the power switch swipe of the hand on/off. Great bulbs. My guy even took it off the grill and used as a work light for his car at night. Great little grill light. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lying is not cool!
customer_reviews.text: Why would you sell a product that does not even "match" the packibg box, not to mention that batteries are not included! Be aware, its not the same that shown on pictures and discrimination. So not happy here....
customer_reviews.author: P. Chaploutskiy

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with a little quirk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great grill lamp. I've used a few times since I purchased it a few months ago and the batteries are still holding strong. It's well built with one exception. The power button, placed on the top of the unit can easily be turned on as it's highly sensitive. I found the lamp on after covering my grill. Perhaps, moving the button to the side or changing the power method might aid this. I understand that the design promotes a more weather tolerant build, but can also lead to a lot of waste. Nonetheless, I'd buy it again if something happens to it.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Weather Resistant? Ha!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, not sure if these are paid reviews but this light was dim before I even had a chance to use it. Fresh out the box it was bright LED's, one night of using it on the grill it's dim. Tried replacing the batteries, nothing. I think it's due to the rain, it's definitely not weather resistant.

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: wonderful works great, a nice bright light for BBq at night
customer_reviews.author: nursemama4

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!

He placed it in the middle of the grill, which is about 3.5 feet wide, and the light has no problem illuminating the whole still. The "on" button is sensitive, which makws it easy to turn off and on when your hands are full. Definitely a great gift with a good bang for your buck. Highly recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Justina Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bright light makes for easy grilling at night

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gadget- quality and function!

Compact size doesn't get in the way, clamp is adaptable for various connections and allows for positioning the light many ways. Three brightness levels can be changed by a touch, so if fingers are messy it doesn't get on the light Also appreciate the pouch for storage- everything stays together neatly! Very useful for year-round, after dark (or early starts) grilling.

customer_reviews.title: This is a useful light for grills.

I particularly like that it is easily adjustable and I don't have to be careful about knocking it over because it is attached securely. But, if I need to move it I am able to do that quickly and easily. I recommend it.

I am sending this back. Definitely not recommended.
